text:
IRTH CHECKLIST IMPLEMENTATION GUIDE  40  
JUST BEFORE PUSHING (OR BEFORE CAESAREAN) 
    Response 
1. Does mother need to start antibiotics? 
 Y N
  W as temperature taken?  Y N
2.  Does mother need to start magnesium sulfate and  
antihypertensive treatment?                              Y N
  W as blood pressure taken?                                                            Y N
3. Are essential supplies at bedside?
 For mother
 
 
a.
 Gloves
 Y N
  b. Alcohol-based handrub or soap and clean
